forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
